DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to develop and implement quality improvement programs for the treatment of atrial fibrillation (AF) in China based on the successful experience of the AHA‚ÄêGet with the Guidelines program. This two-year program will use data collection, analysis, feedback, and process improvement to extend the use of evidence-based guidelines throughout the healthcare system and improve patient care of atrial fibrillation.
DOC.criteria: Hospitalized patients with discharge diagnosis as atrial fibrillation between February 2015 and June 2016
